column1: glossary````Glossary``Ruth Petrie`Charlotte Pascoe`This glossary represents the concepts defined in the IPCC Data Distribution Centre (DDC) Glossary. The DDC glossary was adapted at the Science and Technology Facilities Council (STFC) for use in the CLIPC Climate Information Portal
